{{Wired embedded system |brand=Banana Pi |model=BPI |revision=S64 Core |asin= |est_release_date=01/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SinoVoIP |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Actions Semi |cpu1_model=S700 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLMAG1WEPD-B031 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Allwinner |ram1_model=AWL3A1632 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num= |serial= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1; |flags=HDMI out, LVDS, GPIO, SoDIMM (204-pin) |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= }} {{TagLine|Banana Pi BPI S64 Core}} :[http://www.sinovoip.com.cn/ecpzs.asp?dlb_id=142 Product page]
{{WPLink|Banana_Pi BPi}} {{See also|Banana Pi|SinoVoIP}}
*[[Banana Pi BPI S64]] (2018) • [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi BPi] • [http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-S64_Core Core] :CPU: [[Actions Semi]] [http://www.actions-semi.com/en/productview.aspx?id=225 S700] @1.2GHz • [https://drive.google.com/file/d/1x1V_RP4tQzn9-BkS2L90Xgyqqz3MpLWV/view DS] :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) 64-bit :GPU: Mali-450 MP6 (4PP + 2GP) :Flash: 8GB (eMMC) Storage :RAM: 2GB ([http://files.pine64.org/doc/datasheet/pine64/AWL3A1632_mobile_lpddr3_1600Mbps.pdf LPDDR3]) Memory
===Links=== *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-S64_Core ''Banana Pi BPI S64 Core'' on '''BPi''' Wiki] *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_Series_Comparison ''Banana Pi Series Comparison'' on '''BPi''' Wiki] *[http://linux-sunxi.org/Category:Sinovoip ''SinoVoIP'' on '''SunXi''']
===Models=== :;[[Banana Pi]] • [[Allwinner]] • [[List of SBCs]] *[[Banana Pi BPI]] (2014) • [[Allwinner]] A20 *[[Banana Pi BPI Pro]] (2014) • [[Allwinner]] A20 *[[Banana Pi BPI R1]] (2015) • [[Allwinner]] A20 *[[Banana Pi BPI R2]] (2017) • [[MediaTek]] MT7623N *[[Banana Pi BPI R64]] (2018) • [[MediaTek]] MT7622 *[[Banana Pi BPI M1+]] (2014) • [[Allwinner]] A20 *[[Banana Pi BPI M2]] (2015) • [[Allwinner]] A31S *[[Banana Pi BPI M2+]] (2016) • [[Allwinner]] H3 *[[Banana Pi BPI M2 Berry]] (2016) • [[Allwinner]] V40 *[[Banana Pi BPI M2 Magic]] (2016) • [[Allwinner]] A33/R16 *[[Banana Pi BPI M2 Ultra]] (2016) • [[Allwinner]] R40 *[[Banana Pi BPI M2 Zero]] (2017) • [[Allwinner]] H2+ *[[Banana Pi BPI M3]] (2015) • [[Allwinner]] A83T *[[Banana Pi BPI M4]] (2020) • [[Realtek]] RTD1395 *[[Banana Pi BPI P2 Zero]] (2018) • [[Allwinner]] H2+ *[[Banana Pi BPI W2]] (2016) • [[Realtek]] RTD1296 *[[Banana Pi BPI M64]] (2016) • [[Allwinner]] A64 *[[Banana Pi BPI S64]] (2018) • [[Actions]] S700
===See also=== *[[Banana Pi BPI R1]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz *[[Banana Pi BPI Pro]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz :1x GbE (RJ45), WiFi: 802.11bgn (AP6181), 2x USB 2.0 host, 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) *[[Banana Pi BPI M1]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz *[[Banana Pi BPI M1+]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz *[[Banana Pi BPI M2]] - ''Allwinner'' A31s 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz *[[Banana Pi BPI M2+]] - ''Allwinner'' H3 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz *[[Banana Pi BPI M3]] - ''Allwinner'' A83T 8-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.8GHz :GbE switch ([[Realtek]] RTL8211E/D) + WiFi 802.11bgn (AP6212) + BT 4.0 *[[Banana Pi BPI G1]] - MCU: STM32F103CB ARM (Cortex-M3) 32-bit RISC core :WiFi: [[TI]] CC3200 ARM (Cortex-M4) WiSoC, BT: [[TI]] CC2540, ZigBee: [[TI]] CC2530 *[[Banana Pi BPI D1]] - CPU: ''Anyka'' AK3918 (ARM986EJ) 32-bit RISC @400MHz *[[Banana Pi BPI F2]] (08/2018) - [[Freescale (NXP)]] i.MX6 ARM (Cortex-A9) :CPU: 4x MPCore (w/ TrustZone); Memory: 2GB; Storage: 8GB (eMMC) :GPU: OpenGL ES 2.0; 1x Mini PCIe, 3x USB 2.0, 1x SATA, 1x GbE
